cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagasa

sentence.kanji: このケーブルの長さは1メートルです。
sentence.romaji: kono ke-buru no nagasa ha ichime-toru desu
sentence.english: The length of this cable is one meter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouban

sentence.kanji: あそこの交番で道を聞きましょう。
sentence.romaji: asoko no kouban de michi wo kikimashou
sentence.english: Let's ask for directions at that police box.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bangou

sentence.kanji: この番号に電話してください。
sentence.romaji: kono bangou ni denwa shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please call this number.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouchou

sentence.kanji: あの人は高校の校長だ。
sentence.romaji: ano hito ha koukou no kouchou da
sentence.english: That person is a high school principal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's choujo

sentence.kanji: うちの長女は10歳です。
sentence.romaji: uchi no choujo ha jusai desu
sentence.english: Our oldest daughter is ten.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chounan

sentence.kanji: 彼の長男は8才です。
sentence.romaji: kare no chounan ha hasai desu
sentence.english: His oldest son is eight years old.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bangumi

sentence.kanji: 私はこの番組が好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kono bangumi ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like this show.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's banchi

sentence.kanji: その建物の番地は分かりますか。
sentence.romaji: sono tatemono no banchi ha wakarimasu ka
sentence.english: Do you know the building's plot number?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitaku

sentence.kanji: 自宅に電話を下さい。
sentence.romaji: jitaku ni denwa wo kudasai
sentence.english: Please call home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otaku

sentence.kanji: 先生のお宅はどちらですか。
sentence.romaji: sensei no otaku ha dochira desu ka
sentence.english: Where is the teacher's house?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juutaku

sentence.kanji: ここは静かな住宅地だ。
sentence.romaji: koko ha shizukana juutakuchi da
sentence.english: This is a quiet residential area.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuchou

sentence.kanji: 上司は私の主張を受け入れた。
sentence.romaji: joushi ha watashi no shuchou wo ukeireta
sentence.english: My boss accepted my argument.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiparu

sentence.kanji: 娘が私の手を引っ張った。
sentence.romaji: musume ga watashi no te wo hipata
sentence.english: My daughter tugged on my hand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kami

sentence.kanji: 昨日、髪を切りました。
sentence.romaji: kinou kami wo kirimashita
sentence.english: I had my hair cut yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moufu

sentence.kanji: この毛布は暖かい。
sentence.romaji: kono moufu ha atatakai
sentence.english: This blanket is warm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's techou

sentence.kanji: 新しい手帳を買いました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii techou wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a new notebook.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's denwachou

sentence.kanji: 電話帳を見せてください。
sentence.romaji: denwachou wo misete kudasai
sentence.english: Please show me the telephone book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ganbaru

sentence.kanji: 明日の試験、頑張ってね。
sentence.romaji: ashita no shiken ganbate ne
sentence.english: Good luck on tomorrow's exam.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ke

sentence.kanji: 猫の毛がセーターに付いた。
sentence.romaji: neko no ke ga se-ta- ni tsuita
sentence.english: I got cat hair on my sweater.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kazegusuri

sentence.kanji: この風邪薬を飲みなさい。
sentence.romaji: kono kazegusuri wo nominasai
sentence.english: Take this cold medicine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaichou

sentence.kanji: 初めに会長が挨拶した。
sentence.romaji: hajime ni kaichou ga aisatsu shita
sentence.english: First was the chairman's greetings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagasode

sentence.kanji: 今日は寒いので長袖を着ました。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha samui node nagasode wo kimashita 。
sentence.english: I put on a long-sleeved shirt because it's cold today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagaraku

sentence.kanji: 長らくお待たせしました。
sentence.romaji: nagaraku o matase shimashita 。
sentence.english: I'm sorry to keep you waiting for such a long time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagamochi

sentence.kanji: このコートは長持ちしている。
sentence.romaji: kono ko-to ha nagamochi shite iru
sentence.english: I've had this coat for a long time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagaiki

sentence.kanji: この村の人たちは長生きです。
sentence.romaji: kono mura no hitotachi ha nagaiki desu
sentence.english: People in this village live a long life.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chouhoukei

sentence.kanji: 私の部屋は長方形です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no heya ha chouhoukei desu
sentence.english: My room is rectangular.

cards.english: long conversation, talk for a long time
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagabanashi

sentence.kanji: 母が電話で長話をしているんだ。
sentence.romaji: haha ga denwa de nagabanashi wo shite iru n da
sentence.english: My mother is having a long talk on the telephone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naganen

sentence.kanji: 彼は長年の友人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha naganen no yuujin desu
sentence.english: He's an old friend of mine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nenchou

sentence.kanji: 彼がこのグループで一番年長です。
sentence.romaji: kare ga kono guru-pu de ichiban nenchou desu
sentence.english: He's the most senior in this group.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagabiku

sentence.kanji: 会議が長引いているようです。
sentence.romaji: kaigi ga nagabiite iru you desu
sentence.english: The conference seems to be dragging on.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senchou

sentence.kanji: 私がこの船の船長です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ga kono fune no senchou desu
sentence.english: I'm captain of this ship.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagatsuzuki

sentence.kanji: 彼は仕事が長続きしません。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shigoto ga nagatsuzuki shimasen
sentence.english: He can't keep a job for long.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's buchou

sentence.kanji: 部長に仕事の相談をしたんだ。
sentence.romaji: buchou ni shigoto no soudan wo shita n da
sentence.english: I consulted the manager about my job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shichou

sentence.kanji: 新しい市長が選ばれました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii shichou ga erabaremashita
sentence.english: A new mayor was chosen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chouki

sentence.kanji: 今回は長期の滞在です。
sentence.romaji: konkai ha chouki no taizai desu
sentence.english: This time I'll stay for a long time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rusuban

sentence.kanji: 私は留守番の者です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha rusuban no mono desu
sentence.english: I'm looking after the house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kitaku

sentence.kanji: 夜の11時に帰宅しました。
sentence.romaji: yoru no juuichiji ni kitaku shimashita
sentence.english: I came home at 11 o'clock in the evening.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juutakuchi

sentence.kanji: その住宅地は便利な場所にあるね。
sentence.romaji: sono juutakuchi ha benri na basho ni aru ne
sentence.english: That residential area is conveniently located.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honyaku

sentence.kanji: 彼の翻訳は分かりやすいですよ。
sentence.romaji: kare no honyaku ha wakariyasui desu yo
sentence.english: His translation is easy to understand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's junban

sentence.kanji: これを順番通りに並べ替えて下さい。
sentence.romaji: kore wo junban doori ni narabe kaete kudasai
sentence.english: Please rearrange these in order.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kachou

sentence.kanji: 彼は課長に昇進しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kachou ni shoushin shimashita
sentence.english: He was promoted to section chief.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinchou

sentence.kanji: 身長はどれくらいありますか。
sentence.romaji: shinchou ha dore kurai arimasu ka
sentence.english: How tall are you?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's enchou

sentence.kanji: 国会の会期が延長されたわね。
sentence.romaji: kokai no kaiki ga enchou sareta wa ne
sentence.english: The session of the Diet has been extended.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nisemono

sentence.kanji: 彼らが売っていたのは偽物だ。
sentence.romaji: karera ga ute ita no ha nisemono da
sentence.english: What they were selling was a fake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koui

sentence.kanji: 彼の行為はみんなの誤解を招いたわ。
sentence.romaji: kare no koui ha minna no gokai wo maneita wa
sentence.english: His actions ended up misleading everyone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seichou

sentence.kanji: 庭の木、大きく成長したわね。
sentence.romaji: niwa no ki、 ookiku seichou shita wa ne
sentence.english: The tree in the garden has grown a lot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ban

sentence.kanji: 今日は私が皿を洗う番ですね。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha watashi ga sara wo arau ban desu ne
sentence.english: It's my turn to do dishes today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kichou

sentence.kanji: 機長の放送があったの。
sentence.romaji: kichou no housou ga ata no
sentence.english: There was an announcement from the captain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenkai

sentence.kanji: 話の展開についていけない。
sentence.romaji: hanashi no tenkai ni tsuiteikenai
sentence.english: I can't follow the thread of the conversation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haten

sentence.kanji: あの会社は目覚しく発展しているね。
sentence.romaji: ano kaisha ha mezamashiku haten shite iru ne
sentence.english: That company has expanded remarkably.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinchou

sentence.kanji: 彼は緊張していたな。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kinchou shite ita na
sentence.english: He felt nervous.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuchou

sentence.kanji: 部長は京都に出張中です。
sentence.romaji: buchou ha kyouto ni shuchouchuu desu
sentence.english: The manager is on a business trip to Kyoto.
